import React from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import {TrashIcon, MilestoneIcon} from '@primer/octicons-react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; import DropdownButton from 'react-bootstrap/DropdownButton'; const TodoItem = ({data, cnt, deleteItem}) => { const statusColor = { 'passive': "text-secondary", 'in progress': "text-primary", 'done': "text-success", 'deadlines close': "text-warning", 'too late': "text-danger", 'important': "text-warning" }, statusBg = { 'passive': "bg-secondary", 'in progress': "bg-primary", 'done': "bg-success", 'deadlines close': "bg-warning", 'too late': "bg-danger", 'important': "bg-warning" } return (
{data.status} passive setStatus(this.value)} className={"in progress"} > in progress done deadlines close too late important
{cnt} {/**/} {data.title} {data.text}
{data.startDate}
{data.endDate}
); }; export default TodoItem
